law.text:
The director of the Division of Incident Management within the Department of Highways' Office of Highway Safety shall be responsible for statewide transportation emergency and critical incident information and systems control. The director:
Shall be directly responsible and report to the executive director of the Office of Highway Safety; and
May, with the approval of the executive director, employ the staff necessary to perform the duties, functions, and responsibilities of the division.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 13, sec. 7, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2003.
